Enrichment analysis across samples

Source: R/polyEnrichment.R
polyEnrichment.Rd

Tests enrichment of neighborhoods across samples.

Usage

polyEnrichment(
  object,
  region = TRUE,
  targets = "default",
  neighborhoods_of_interest = c("union", "intersect"),
  des,
  coef,
  p_adjust_method = "fdr",
  return_object = FALSE
)

Arguments

object

A POLYspace object or a list of POLYspace objects.

region

Logical; stratify by region.

targets

Targets to test.

neighborhoods_of_interest

Neighborhoods of interest to include in the test.

des

Design matrix.

coef

Coefficient name or index in des to be tested.

p_adjust_method

Method for p-value adjustment (e.g., "fdr").

return_object

Logical; if TRUE, return the updated object instead of a table.

Value

If return_object = TRUE, an updated POLYspace object with enrichment results attached; otherwise a list of enrichment results.
